title: Over 114,000 Acres of Maine Wilderness are Now Open to Gravel Biking
content:
Thanks to the work of the non-profit Appalachian Mountain Club, cyclists are now being encouraged to ride on hundreds of miles of previously-inaccessible dirt roads.

Read the full article at Over 114,000 Acres of Maine Wilderness are Now Open to Gravel Biking on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
